name: Consumer Search HK
overview:
Consumer Search, a sophisticated market research consultancy, was established in 1982 and offers comprehensive market research services to a diverse range of clients. Our services reach many parts of the Asia Pacific region. Members of the research, data-processing and fieldwork staffs all possess the expertise in specialist research fields. With over two decades of solid experience, we are confident and competent in providing first-class optimum services.

Our mission, No Compromise on Quality, best illustrates our working culture. We aim at delivering Quality and Flexible services to our clients who wish to discover the Regional markets.

To fulfill our mission “No Compromise on Quality”, Consumer Search has obtained remarkable qualifications from well-known organizations worldwide:

ISO9001:2008 certification issued by the Lloyd&#8217;s Register Quality Assurance Ltd (LRQA)
ISO accreditation by the United Kingdom Accreditation Service (UKAS) and the American National Standards Institute – the American Society for Quality National Accreditation Board (ANAB), on our quality management system (QMS) about our marketing research consultancy services in Hong Kong
Comply with ICC/ESOMAR International Code of Marketing and Social Research Practice
Member of China Marketing Research Association (CMRA)
Member of Mystery Shopping Providers Association (MSPA)
Member of Hong Kong General Chamber of Commerce (HKGCC)

We started our business in Mainland China in 1994 and are a member of China Marketing Research Association (CMRA). We currently have offices in Bejing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Hong Kong as well as an extensive network of affiliates in major Asia-Pacific countries.

Over the years we have built up a prestigious client base and is particularly competent in serving multinational companies, government and semi-governmental departments. We are always improving our team to accommodate the growing needs of clients.

acquisition.source_description: INTAGE, Inc., will acquire Consumer Search HK Ltd.
